reviews.content:
The Hotel staff were fantastic 
however it was the deal on Hotels.com that was misleading 
read all info and get confirmation from hotel
location supberb
Great hotel and a customer service! Highly recommended!
reviews.reply:
Dear Ellie, 

Warmest Greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort, 

We would like to thank you for choosing our hotel during your recent visit to Bali and for sharing your appreciation with us.We are delighted to learn that you had an excellent stay with us and particularly value our hotel. 

We all look forward to welcoming you again to our boutique resort in the future. 

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content: We was upgraded and although room was spacious it was shabby although they are in the process of renovating at present. As only 1 room was ready on arrival and the other room wasn't until about 7pm we were given one room till 6pm on check out day which was good as our flight was at 8pm. A/C was noisy. The restaurant food is good although the service can be a slow. The pool towels could do with a boil wash. Hotel has some lovely plants and grounds within a busy area.  On top of beach sunset each night is lovely.
Excellent
reviews.reply:
Dear Yogesh, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa, 

We thank you for staying with us recently and appreciate your review very much. 

We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you in the near future.

reviews.content: This hotel is very well located. Close to a shopping mall the beach is just the other side of the road. Supermarkets, pharmacy and other maskets just 3 minutes walk away. Hotel staff extremly friendly and helpful and professional. Warm welcoming and make you feel comfortable. A bit bad point is the WiFi which was not working very well. The food was delicios and good entertainment. I would hihgly recommend this to anyone. We stayed in a garden deluxe room which has an amazing terrace. Its just beautiful, inside out.

reviews.summary: Nice hotel with traditional Bali feel
reviews.content: Really nice hotel, good location with lots of restaurants and cheap shops about. Loved the traditional feel and abundance of greenery. Pool and beds are really nice, well kept and clean. Hotel restaurant serves Italian, really tasty and you can get room service.

reviews.summary: Decent hotel close to port, airport and beach
reviews.content: This is a modern hotel with some traditional Balinese features. While the hotel itself is pretty, it is located on a very busy road, directly in front of a busy beach that would be beautiful if not for the garbage all over it.  The noise and smell from the street weren't pleasant from the restaurant or the pool though the room itself was quiet.  From what I could see, this hotel seemed like one of the better choices for a quieter stay in Kuta but Kuta itself is so busy, dirty and touristy that I would only ever want to stay for a single night transfer as it is very close to air and sea transport hubs.
Really nice hotel next to the beach. Rooms are very clean and comfortable and the staff are very helpful. I Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.

Good hotel and great staff. Like free towels at the pool, like the bar and entertainment, room was cleaned with bed made and new towels everday, liked the fridge bar and snacks. The hotel is over the road from the beach and in a central location.
Please beware of The Hard Rock Café around the corner from hotel they tried to rip me off charging nearly £40 for 1 glass of wine and 1 pint of lager which I told them I'm not paying for as I didn't think the price was right the barman insisted the price was right and deliberately tried to rip me off I managed to get the manager who was not much better but I managed to reduce the price to £14.70 but really annoyed with The Hard Rock Bar in Kuta Bali

reviews.summary: Friendly staff, close to the beach
reviews.content: We had booked a room a few hours before checking in and the staff were able to accommodate us when we had arrived. We stayed for 5 nights and the grounds were well looked after and cared for and the facilities were always clean. Had the best mojitos at the bar and pasta at the restaurant. All the staff at the resort were very friendly and considerate. We felt safe and comfortable there. There were daily activities to join in and entertainment at night by the pool/bar. We had fun joining in on the cocktail lesson and listening to the band/dj. Will definitely come back to our bali 'home' at Kuta Seaview.
Love the place, near to the beach. But room cleanliness need to improve, especially on bath room.

reviews.summary: hotel was dated, beach was the dirtiest ever.
reviews.content: Arrived to a dirty hotel room the hotel is dated and needs sorting. No one seems to care about the beach not the hotel the other businesses the local government or the people who earn their living on it. THE BEACH IS AN EASY FIX

Location is good. Beachwalk mall is Few mins walk.

Lot of massage places near the hotel.

reviews.summary: Nice hotel close to beach and shopping area
reviews.content: The hotel was clean and staff was good....good breakfast and an awesome location....overall a decent place to stay and enjoy the Kuta beach at Bali

When we arrived the hotel was over booked so they transferred us to their sister hotel called Ramayana which was just around the corner. It was over all a better, bigger bedroom with a sea view balcony. When we were transferred back to our original hotel Kuta SEAVIEW, they gave us an upgrade as compensation. The staff were really friendly and even decorated out bedroom and bought my husband a cake as it was his birthday. They couldn't have done anymore for us. Very accommodating and I would Definately stay here again as everything is walking distance. Very reasonably priced hotel if you book a little in advance.
nice hotel and perfect location

reviews.summary: Great location but no elevator in the building.
reviews.content: There is no elevator or escalator in the building, and this is supposed to be 5 stars hotel?  We stayed on 3rd floor. Location is great, in front of Kuta Beach and it is in the middle of Kuta.Breakfast buffet is good enough.

Staff were friendly and hospitable. Location is just opposite the beach. One constructive feedback I have is for the hotel to have 1 serviceable lift for guests staying in level 2 or 3 of the hotel. Both lifts were under renovation during our stay.

Its not a 4 star. Great location but service not good.
Rooms old and not cleaned properly. Breakfast was not good, i stayed 6 nights and didn't go to breakfast after first time. I travel a lot, and rely on reviews, i read the reviews and thought its ok. I don't understand why these people think its ok. It ruined our trip. They evan tried to charge us twice for mini bar, when we were checking out  and in a hurry to get to airport. Every time you complain they are sorry sorry sorry. Never again.
I have never left a negative review before.
Located near the beach. The downside was the urban infrastructure around the hotel, too much traffic and the streets could not handle the traffic.
reviews.reply:
Dear David, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort, 

We are sorry if our services could not lived up to your expectation, but we thank you for your feedback. 

We hope we could have a chance to serve you better in services in the future. 

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content: Convenient location to beach and dining. Buffet breakfast had everything you’d want
reviews.reply:
Dear Stacey, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa Bali, 

We would like to take a moment to thank you for the great comment and was glad to hear that you had enjoyed staying with us. 

We are looking forward to your next visit at our boutique resort. 

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.summary: Good, but make sure if you have a balcony.
reviews.content: Good hotel, pool and restaurant. Our room had no balcony and no sea view.
reviews.reply:
Dear Andrew, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa Bali, 

Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are very sorry that on this occasion some of the things did not meet your expectations such as room had no balcony and no sea view. 

On behalf of the management we would like to take an apology for all the things happened during your holidays at our resort. 

Thank you again for sharing your experience and it is our hope that we will be having a chance of serving you again in the in the future.

Best regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content:
Close to the beach
But not seaview

There’s a crowded street between the beach and the hotel. 

And the shuttle bus to airport is not free. 
You’ll be charged about 150k, just using normal taxis.
reviews.reply:
Dear Lily, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort, 

Thank you for sharing your stay experience with us and posted your review on Expedia.com. We are very sorry that on this occasion some of the things did not meet your expectations. 

We hope that we will be having a chance of serving you again in the in the future.

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content: Close to beach, nice pool by the bar, washroom is clean and layout is nice.
reviews.reply:
Dear Agnes, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa Bali, 

We would like to thank you for choosing our hotel during your recent visit to Bali and for sharing your appreciation with us.We are delighted to learn that you had an excellent stay with us and particularly value our hotel. 

We all look forward to welcoming you again to our boutique resort in the future.

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.summary: Nice gardening old facility with disappointment
reviews.content:
Check in: a male staff helped us check in. However it seems that he was bit not patient, when I asked what time is the breakfast, he said please sit there and please sit here blah blah, and did not answer my question directly,  saying "will explain it to you later" What? !
And the staff not smiling, like an old man teaching lesson to a kid! 

Facility: hotel facility very old, and the washroom towel really dirty and old! Shampoo in the hotel really too basic. 

We live on the second floor, there is no lift, although the luggage was carried by staff, still feel bit uncomfortable.

And another thing really dont understand, all aircon main compressor unit is in the corridor! Making it really hot and feel like breathing in all dust while walking in the corridor!

Privacy is no good, sitting on the second floor balcony can see downstairs at other people balcony. The gardening does not provide privacy. And can hear next door guest talking on the balcony.

The only good thing is, bed is very comfortable, and balcony layout is really nice. At night sitting there looking at moon with birds chirping is really relaxing.

Breakfast is a disappointment. Not many choice, and there are insects on the break all over without cover!

Great location! Hotel very private! Service was ok needs to be more personalised eg when departing a reminder note for guest with an offer Of a wake up call and assistance with luggage and maybe an offer of transport to airport! Just a little help! Especially if it’s your first time in Bali can be a bit daunting.

Great hotel, Close to everything , Friendly staff, Good servce, Only thing i didnt like was the wifi very bad , little hit and miss .. Very unusable out near the pool , Speeds seem to be hit and miss.
reviews.reply:
Dear Benjamin, 

Thank you for sharing your valuable feedback. We have personally discussed this with the respective departments to ensure that this does not repeat. We do apologies and we do sincerely hope that you will visit us again in the future to make up for the unpleasant experience.

Best regards, 
Mariani

reviews.summary: 30 metres to beach from bar and restaurant
reviews.content:
KuraSeaview is at the centre of Kuta beach life. Rooms are clean. Showers, a/c, fridge, beds -medium- are  all perfect. There is a nice balcony for the smokers..The restaurant and bar - Rosso Vivo front the hotel. French onion soup is really good as was gnoccho Gorgonzola and also the salmon. Live music, rock mostly, is 50 metres away..
The staff at the hotel are all very charming and many speak good English. Requests are performed quickly and efficiently. The Beauty/ massage/ pedicure etc salon is very good. Negatives include the hotel entrance and foyer which are less impressive and renovations being carried out. Lastly the price is very good in relation to nearby hotels. Happy holidays.
reviews.reply:
Dear colin, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa, 

We thank you for staying with us recently and appreciate your review very much. We are sorry that the experience you had was not up to your expectation.

To upkeep the property we are conducting regular maintenance of our facilities. 

Once again our apologies and we do sincerely hope that you will visit us again in the future to make up for the unpleasant experience.

Thank you & best regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content: Staff so helpful couldn't do enough to help make our stay wonderful
reviews.reply:
Dear ash, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa, 

We are really appreciating your time to drop us your nice comment regarding your stay at our property. I’m happy that you were overall happy with the services provided by our Resort.

We hope your next visit with us will be as wonderful as the previous one.

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content: Nice hotel close to all amenities.  Staff very friendly & would recommend to family & friends
reviews.reply:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thanks for  sending us your great feedback. We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay. 
We are happy that you were overall satisfied with the facilities and services provided by our Resort. 

Thank you again for sharing your experience and hope your next visit with us will be as perfect as the previous one.

Kind regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content:
This hotel is in a great location opposite Kuta beach and in between Poppies 1 & 2. Thats was probably the best point about it. I had a seaview room on the top floor with a balcony  (great for relaxing and also drying clothes). Please note there is no elevator here so if you are less able this might be an issue, although i believe there are some cottages that dont have stairs. The hotel on site was nice and you could choose a table that sat street side which i enjoyed. I felt the breakfast was abit average and lacking in choice for 150,000 rupiah but maybe ive been spoilt from my last hotels. In terms of cleanliness i felt the room was tidy but not very clean. The shower walls had alot of marks on them, as did the balcony windows (mould) and there was a big build up of dust on the pretty wooden carvings. The towels had gone gray and some were threadbare. The cleaners really could put more attention into the job. I found the bed firm but comfortable and the room had good aircon with a fan as well. Every night there was a bar on Poppies 1 with a live band that was VERY loud and could be clearly heard until midnight when they finished. There is also construction going on at the hotel which disturbed my rest at times. 
All the staff i spoke to were friendly and accommodating. Personally i do feel that the hotel is way too overpriced when compared to other properties in the area. If they could improve on the cleaning, amenities in the room and overall comfort it would be better.

Kuta Seaview is located directly across from Kuta Beach.  The area is quite busy.  If you want to be in the middle of everything this is a good place to stay.  Rooms are Balinese style, a lot of character but not too well sealed.
reviews.reply:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for sharing your stay experience with us. We will be sure to take your feedback on board to continue to seek for improvement upon current service in an effort to achieve excellence. 

We hope to welcome you again in the near future.

Best regards, 
Mariani

reviews.content: I have stayed at this hotel before and each time I have a room that seems to be as far away from the amenities as possible. Otherwise ot too bad, but try a different hotel next time. Free pick up would be very welcome!!
reviews.reply:
Dear Marty, 

Warmest greeting from Kuta Seaview Boutique Resort & Spa, 

We regret that some of our services were not met with your expectation and we are very sorry and would like to take an apology for it.

Again we would like to thank you for your continuous support on our resort and that you will give us the opportunity of welcoming you again. 

Kind regards, 
Made Mariani

reviews.content: Kuta Seaview. Loved everything about our stay! Not 1 but 2 upgrades. Fantastic location. Great room. Beautiful food. Lovely staff. Definitely recommend and will definitely be returning  😁😁😁💜💜💜💜💜
reviews.reply:
Dear Melissa, 

On behalf of the whole staff of Kuta Sea View Boutique Resort & Spa, we would like to take a moment to thank you for the great comment and was glad to hear that you had enjoyed staying with us. 

We are looking forward to your next visit at our boutique resort.

reviews.content:
The hotel is near all the nightclubs and bars. If you want to get some sleep or have small kids I suggest staying somewhere else. I could hear the noise at night until 11pm. 
They are renovating (jul 2018) I belive once is done it would be a lovely place.

Really great location. 
Good price. 
A weakness of shower water. 
No elevator. 
Loud from outside.

This hotel is close to Kuta beach but on the busy end of the beach road. Upgraded to Cottage room which was more of a traditional Balinese style however it is tucked away in a corner. Pool area was good to relax at as few of the guest actually used the pool

reviews.summary: A good choice if Kuta is your destination
reviews.content: This hotel and the grounds were very nice and well maintained. The rooms are set back, and there is no view, but they are villa like. The staff was friendly and provided excellent service. The only issue is that the Kuta location meant it's on a busy street.
reviews.reply:
Dear roger, 

It has been our great pleasure to welcome you at our hotel and we appreciate you sharing your feelings about your stay with us. We were very pleased to read that you had a good stay and particularly value our hotel.

We all look forward to welcoming you again soon

reviews.content:
Great location! It's close to markets, restaurants and directly across from Kuta beach. Nice pool area to relax with a bintang in the sun.
The room was clean, comfortable bed and the balcony was a nice place to chill and watch the sunset.
Only annoying thing was our aircon stopped working, but staff were efficient and got people to come and fix it straight away. 
Will stay here again! 😊
Were very pleased with our selection we did online with Expedia, Very convenient place to stay in Kuta, nice safe and quite. Friendly staff

reviews.summary: Amazing place to stay on vacation..
reviews.content: It's an amazing place especially for the beachgoers. Only a slightly thing need to address, the tv program not on hd quality also the check in process is a little bit slow.

Good value hotel with local feel close to beach. Good service.

General too in Bali - go for Blue bird taxi and metered fares. All negotiated prices are too high.
For tours and purchases negotiate. List price is too high.

Fantastic resort in bustling Kuta with the beach across the road. Rooms are very comfortable and once inside the outside noise is blocked away. Staff are super friendly and their sole aim is to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Would definitely stay here again.

reviews.summary: Below average 4 star hotel for sure
reviews.content: I traveled in Bali, all around, for a week. I stayed in three hotels. This hotel was average at best and the worst out of the three I stayed in. Don’t get me wrong, it was definitely not bad. But, it certainly wasn’t good. I expected more from the reviews and ratings of this hotel. It may have just been a bad time. Some construction was ongoing. I didn’t find the staff overly attentive. And, the room was definitely below average for a 4-Star hotel. Some of the towels were tarnished and had small stains and lipstick marks. There were some small ants in the room here and there. I actually pulled out my phone upon check in to see if perhaps I got the information wrong and this was not the same hotel I booked. Or, maybe there weren’t as many stars or good reviews as I remembered. I was surprised that this was the same hotel. I thought it may have been a 3-Star hotel or a different hotel. Again, it was not bad. I just expected more from a 4-Star hotel with good reviews. The staff seemed to always be occupied and not responsive or overly pleasant. No one was rude; just not overly responsive or pleasant. By far my least favorite hotel and staff out of the three hotels I stayed in on Bali. Nothing bad here, just nothing good either.

i have been a regular customer for this hotel since almost 20 years.
this is my home away grom home in bali!
the one and only

The room was comfortable and clean. It might be a bit awkward to say, but there was the biggest toilet bowl I've seen in my life (people wit extra weight would appreciate that) in the bathroom. The balcony was inviting, but useless at the time of our visit as there was a construction going on outside. The repair work didn't block the view, but it made the air unpleasantly dusty. 
Breakfast was alright and the beach is just across the street.

It's a good place to stay. But at the moment they are doing some Renovation/improvement. I just wished we had a balcony just like the ones on the photo that i booked. But still the place looks good. Staff are nice always pleasant and smiling. Breakfast was OK too, you get what you paid for.
Resort location excellant, no smoking areas apply at this resort.

This Hotel is in a great location. The staff were friendly, attentive, and up for a chat when around working the pool or at the amazing breakfast spread. It was the second time I have stayed there and was not disappointed in the slightest. Rooms had comfortable beds and all that is needed . Highly recommend.

My husband and I had an amazing time staying at Seaview. The staff go above and beyond and are friendly and helpful. We also got a free upgrade! Our room was spacious and we were not disturbed by any noise at all. I would happily stay here again.
